title: 09/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a victory lap after a big win for the Ravens over the Chiefs after Lamar Jackson continues to silence all of his critics. He points out one NFL team that needs to admit they’ve made a huge mistake and it’s already too late to try and fix it. He also tells you why he was right about Derek Carr and wrong about Matt Ryan. Plus, Trent Dilfer joins the show to discuss Lamar Jackson’s big win and if Ben Roethlisberger is officially washed up. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
